description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Travels in France during the years 1814-15. Comprising a residence at Paris, during the stay of the allied armies, and at Aix, at the period of the landing of Bonaparte. [vol. 1 by Sir Archibald Alison, William P. Alison and John Hope. vol. 2 by Alexander Fraser Tytler.]", "Appendix. Descriptions and Travels, including Topography" Contributor: ALISON, Archibald - Sir, 1st Bart Contributor: HOPE, John - Right Hon., Lord Justice Clerk Contributor: TYTLER, Alexander Fraser - Hon Contributor: TYTLER, Alexander Fraser - Lord Woodhouselee Author: France Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10169.bbb.30." Volume: 02 Page: 2 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1815 Publisher: Macredie, Skelly & Muckersy Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001302723 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
